snippet.title: Kura5: Bonds of the Undying - Chapter 4 Trailer
snippet.description:
👉 https://chickenhat.itch.io/kura5-bonds-of-the-undying

New This Update
-1 immortal dungeon + 1 undead dungeon
-The aqueducts have been expanded
-Added new portraits, music, and story
-Added an item storage function to all Solar Bank ATMs
-Added additional quests
-Added a gardening mechanic
-Added new items/weapons/summons
-Added the "Steps" enemy
-All San Miguel NPC dialogue has been replaced
-Updates to UI (Addition of a target swap indicator, inventory sorting, etc)
-Nero can now save to multiple slots
-Gameplay tweaks to combat, status effects, and stealth
-Bugs from v0.42 have been fixed
-Minor adjustments and grammar corrections have been made to dialogue

Music by LiteralLapin
Bandcamp - https://literallapin.bandcamp.com
Soundcloud - https://soundcloud.com/literallapin

Follow us at...
twitter: https://twitter.com/boktai3d
tumblr: http://kura5.tumblr.com
discord: http://discord.gg/uJRmcyk
